sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"不同的"之意。
means: different ： 普通用词，强调事物间的区别或本质的不同。有时侧重对比，不着重差别。
various ： 通常强调种类的数目。
diverse ： 语气较强，指性质完全不同，着重显著的区别。

sentence.Network_en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

sentence.Network_en: Since the birds interbreed they cannot be classed as different species.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于这些鸟进行杂交繁殖，不能把它们归为不同的物种。

sentence.Network_en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中乖字的解释 ... (4) 分离;离别[ separate] (1) 不同;差异[ different] (3) 反常;谬误[ abnormal;wrong].
人教版八年级上册英语单词表（含音标） ... 36 lifestyle n. 生活方式 41 different a. 不同的 42 difference n. 不同,差异.
And how ca we feel so different and be so much alike ?, 就是 ! 我们有这么多不一样的地方 , 怎么会感觉又那么像呢?
PETS3_资料内容_资料下载_学习资料共享网 ... diet 饮食，食物 different 差异的，不同的 dig 掘，挖.

list.abs: 字典中差字的解释 ... ◎ 差 chà (1) 区别[ difference] (1) 指派;派遣[ assign;dispatch;send on an errand].
...评价(金发维纳斯)(Blonde Venus,1932)显现再现系统中操纵女性，及父系制度中传授女性性欲为威胁的另一种方法。通过拜物化(fetishize)女性形象，男性尝试去否认其差异(difference)，另外，男性还让女性穿上他们的衣着，使之(雄性化)。影片中如此处理女主角，使女人之所以为女人的女性特质消失了，好似与男性相同。然而，我们会发现，因为父系的自恋倾向，这样反倒有了.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... diet n. 饮食 differ v. 相异，有区别 difference n. 不同.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin different- 'carrying away, differing', from the verb differre (see differ)

encyclopedia.content: 音乐专辑基本信息 专辑名称：Different 歌手：Kate Ryan 语言：国语 风格：Hip-Pop 发行公司：未知 发行日期：2002年 专辑目录 Desenchantee Free Your Mind Got To Move On Head Down In Your Eyes Lift Me Higher Magical Love Mon Coeur Resiste Encore Ne Baisse Pas La Tete Nos Regerds Qui Menflamment One Happy Day Scream For More So In Love Through The Eyes UR (My Love) 英文单词基本含义 different: [ 'difr&

entry.def: If two people or things are different, they are not like each other in one or more ways.

example.ex: London was different from most European capitals...
example.tran: 伦敦同大多数欧洲国家的首都都有所不同。

example.ex: If he'd attended music school, how might things have been different?...
example.tran: 如果他上过音乐学校，事情会有怎样的不同呢？

entry.def: You use different to indicate that you are talking about two or more separate and distinct things of the same kind.

example.ex: Different countries specialised in different products...
example.tran: 不同国家专门生产不同的产品。

example.ex: The number of calories in different brands of drinks varies enormously.
example.tran: 不同牌子的饮料所含的卡路里数大不相同。

entry.tran: 不同寻常的;与众不同的
entry.def: You can describe something as different when it is unusual and not like others of the same kind.

example.ex: This recipe is certainly interesting and different.
example.tran: 这种烹饪法的确很有意思而且与众不同。

means.word_mean: 1. unlike in nature or quality or form or degree;

sentences.sentence: "this meeting was different from the earlier one"

means.word_mean: 3. differing from all others; not ordinary;

sentences.sentence: "advertising that strives continually to be different"
"this new music is certainly different but I don't really like it"
"each interviewed different members of the community"

auth_sentence.content: Purchasing a gun through a licensed dealer is different.
auth_sentence.res_content: Purchasing a gun through a licensed dealer is different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Purchasing a gun through a licensed dealer is different.

auth_sentence.content: So there are different coloured individuals in different habitats.
auth_sentence.res_content: So there are different coloured individuals in different habitats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So there are different coloured individuals in different habitats.

auth_sentence.content: This is it, and it certainly is different.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is it, and it certainly is different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is it, and it certainly is different.

stems_affixes.word_buile: aqui水+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来水的
differ[v.不同]+ent表形容词→adj.不同的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fert=fer带来,拿来+ile能……的→能带来粮食→肥沃的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有花的,开花的,多花的,花盛开的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flori=flor花+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来花→有花的
in不+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已" →冷漠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能推理的, 能推论的

infer[v.推论,推断]+ent+ial……的→adj.推论性的
odori=odor气味+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来气味的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可归[起]因于……的, 可归入……的; 与……有关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+able能……的→能提到的,能找到原因的→可归于……
suffer[v.受苦]+able能……的→adj.可容忍的,可忍耐的
transfer[n.&v.转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘]+able能……的→adj.可转让的
aqui水+fer带来,拿来→n.含水土层, 蓄水层
confer[v.商讨;授予,颁给[勋衔,学位等]]+ence表名词→n.[正式]会议;讨论,商谈

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给予, 商量, 授予
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+fer带来,拿来+ment表名词→共同带来东西→给予[奖品等]
coni松果+fer带来,拿来→带来松果的树→针叶树

stems_affixes.value_cn: 针叶树的,松类的,结球果的

defer敬从+ence表名词→n.敬意,尊重
defer推迟+ment表名词→n.推迟;延迟
differ[v.不同]+ence表名词→n.不同
fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ity表名词→n.肥沃,丰饶
fertilize[v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃]+er表名词→n.[fertiliser]肥料
of一再+fer带来,拿来→一再带来→提供
offer[v.提供,提议,出现 n.出价,提议,意图]+ing表名词→n.报盘,提供的货物
prefer[v.[to]更喜欢,宁愿]+ence表名词→n.[for,to]偏爱,喜爱;优惠;优先选择
pro向前+ffer=fer带来,拿来→带到前面去→贡献出来
refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+ee人→被双方提及的人→裁判

refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+endum表名词→提出[候选人]→选举

sentences.en: Mary and Joan are quite different.

means.word_mean: 个别的, 另外的, 各别的, 各种的

sentences.en: Let's take a different way home today.
sentences.cn: 今天我们回家走另一条路吧。

sentences.en: A department store sells many different things.
sentences.cn: 百货公司出售各种各样的东西。

jushi.english: The twins are cast in entirely different moulds.
jushi.chinese: 这对双胞胎的气质完全不同。

jushi.english: We made this dress in three different colours.
jushi.chinese: 我们做的这种连衣裙,有三种不同的颜色。

jushi.english: People of many different political views belong to the club.
jushi.chinese: 许多持不同政治观点的人同属于这个俱乐部。
